text: ‘tomaloke yaka allahara lagata ansi karai acha ma'i taka kiya bhaya karaima? Athaca tomaloke bhaya nakaraa ye, tomaloke allahara lagata enekuraa bastuka ansi karai acha yara sapakse te'om tomalokara ocarata kono pramana aratirna karaa na'i. Eteke yadi tomaloke jana tente koraa du'i dalara majata konato dala niraapatta labhara bechi hakadara’
